_sText:
You know zm_temple_v1
Nice map good ambience but was made horrible
it's totally leaked and fucked up with stuff
i took a heart and optimized the map so far i could without touching the original geometry
the only thing i made out of it is transforming it into func_detail or it would kill VVIS xD

Changelog:
Theres more than 30 spawnpoints for each team, so map is ok for 64slot players
Fog got added to create even more ambience
some details in geometry got changed and added
Some new spots got added around the map
The hole where you can fall off now has trigger_hurt which kills instantly!
playerclip got added to prevent ppl from getting outside the map
A new room has been created with a waterpool which has raising/lowering water to reach the upper area
The whole water stuff got changed in the map, looks better now!
All the stupid weapons that were scattered around the map are removed. Nobody needs them because they only have 1 clip!
Those big bricks in the hall with that roof are now much more lighter to move them easier around!
In the room with that blue laser stuff there's a secret button which spawns new stuff for building your barricade (up to 7 new pieces)
Skybox got changed because the old mapauthor was too lazy to embed the skybox texture into the BSP (zombie_sky -> hav)


and other stuff i cant remember now
enjoy and have fun!
